Damage, Breakages, Theft and Loss are the tenants responsibility during their stay. Departure - the property should be left in a similar state to its condition on arrival. Check-out time is 16:00 by the latest

You’ll have your own coffee machine and fridge to start your day off right, as well as high-speed Wi-Fi and cable TV to unwind with once the day is done. Sleep in air-conditioned comfort and spread out in your 24m2 room, located minutes from the city and airport. In short: expect a great night’s sleep and a calm oasis amongst your colourful adventures in Green Square and the Sydney CBD.

neighborhood_overview: Centrally located at the southern heel of the CBD, only a short ride from Sydney airport, you’re surrounded by some of Sydney’s hidden gems. Rotate your way around Alexandria’s infamous farm to table café scene. Stroll to Green Square station to begin an adventure in the city. Hang about the green habitat or pop into the latest gallery openings. Become a part of the community and experience all this thriving urban neighbourhood has to offer at Veriu Green Square, boutique hotel in Green Square Sydney.
transit: Sydney Domestic terminal is 4km away and less than a 10-minute taxi ride and less than a 5 min train ride to Green Square, literally just two stops away! Sydney International Terminal is 6km and 10 minute taxi ride and less than a 5 min train ride.
access: You'll have access to your specific hotel suite but also access to all available hotel amenities and services. We are also on-hand 24 hours a day to assist you.
interaction: Our staff are on-hand 24 hours a day for you if you need them.
host_about:
Hi there,

My name is Rory Douglas and I am the Hotel Manager for Veriu Green Square. I am so excited to welcome you to our newest property, opening August 2019.

I've been with Veriu for 2 years now and was previously Hotel Manager for Veriu Broadway, the number 3 hotel in Sydney as rated by travelers on Tripadvisor. 

We have some amazing rooms at our new property, a fantastic restaurant, and a team of absolute superstars who look forward to looking after you!

Hope to meet you in person on your next stay!

Cheers,

Rory

name: 2BD house close to beaches & city
summary: Cosy two bedroom house close to Sydney's best beaches, including Bondi, and the vast Centennial Park, in a great little neighbourhood. The city centre is only a 15 minute bus ride from the end of the street. The house is ideal for a couple or small family.
space: Our two bedroom terrace house has been recently renovated and is a great place to be if you're visiting Sydney over summer. It's close to beaches, including Bondi, and very convenient to the city - near rail and buses. We're in a pretty and quiet street with a small park 50 metres away that kids love. Centennial park is 5 minutes walk away.  The house has two large bedrooms. One has a king size double bed, the other has a bunk bed suitable for up to two children. We also have a portacot for very young children. It has a modern and well equipped kitchen and a TV with HDD/DVD player/recorder, as well as wifi. The bathroom is best described as 'efficient' - it's small but new and clean. There's no bath though, only a shower. Makes us sad too! There is air conditioning in the living areas and ceiling fans in the bedrooms, and the house stays pretty cool even in summer. Bondi Junction is a great place to live. There's plenty of good restaurants within walking distance with many cuisines rep

access: Guests have use of the whole house.
interaction: We will be away when guests are using the house, but are happy to answer any questions that guests might have.
host_about:
I live in Sydney with my partner Melanie and son Elliot (8). We love living in Bondi Junction - it's so easy to get to the beach or the city and there's always something to do. We've done a fair bit of travelling, especially in Europe, and our favourite part of it is always living in someone's home so we can get a sense of what it's like to be local - that's why we're happy to list our place on Air BnB. 

As we will only be renting out our place when we are away, we won't get the chance to meet you if you stay in our home, but hopefully you'll get a sense of who we are from where we live.

name: Bondi Beachside Beauty-2 bed apt
summary: Lovely beachside apartment, just moments from the world famous Bondi to Bronte coastal walk. Relax in one of Bondi's premier roads. Enjoy all of Bondi's best with a beachy home that's close to cafes, transport and both Tamarama and Bondi beaches.
space: Welcome to Bondi Beach. If you're looking for a gorgeous space in a killer location, then you'll enjoy this homely apartment.  We usually rent out the second room (see host reviews for info), but you will have access to the entire apartment for your stay. Bedroom one is a huge master with built in robe and sun room. description: Lovely beachside apartment, just moments from the world famous Bondi to Bronte coastal walk. Relax in one of Bondi's premier roads. Enjoy all of Bondi's best with a beachy home that's close to cafes, transport and both Tamarama and Bondi beaches. Welcome to Bondi Beach. If you're looking for a gorgeous space in a killer location, then you'll enjoy this homely apartment.  We usually rent out the second room (see host reviews for info), but you will have access to the entire apartment for your stay. Bedroom one is a huge master with built in robe and sun room. Bedroom two is a small double and has a large mirrored built in wardrobe with drawers. Sheets are quality Egyptian cotton to make your sleep as comfy as possible. There are 2 cafes right across the street for yummy breakfast, lunch or
neighborhood_overview: We live in the quiet, untouristy part of Bondi Beach, which is why it's so special. Incredible views from Bondi to Bronte can be seen from the garden and outside the front door. Bondi and Tamarama beaches are just a few minutes walk away. Opposite the building are 2 cafes, a post office and a dry cleaners. Bondi's restaurants, bars and supermarkets are just a few minutes walk away.
notes: As we are beachside, street parking is generally max 2 hours, between 8am and 10pm. There is some 24h free parking.
transit: Buses 333, 380 stop just 2 minutes away and connect to Bondi Junction and the City. The 381 stops right outside the apartment and connects to Bondi Junction.
access: Please feel free to utilise the fully equipped kitchen diner and lounge area, or head to the shared patio area downstairs for views of the ocean. Kitchen has a dining table to seat 6 (request chairs on booking) and includes a dishwasher, microwave; stainless steel gas cooker and all crockery. The apartment contains a washing machine and unlimited wifi.
interaction: We will be available on email throughout and you will have a designated contact with keys to the apartment.

host_about:
Hello, I'm 30, from London, England but now living in Sydney, Australia. I love using Airbnb for work and travel to explore places the locals' way. 
Myself and my partner Ezra also host at our Bondi apartment. Having had such great experiences, we aim to do the same for our guests.

neighborhood_overview: Sydney Airport is 5-10mins round the corner. The Eastern and Southern beaches are only a short drive away, and there are also numerous parks around (one accessible by walking down the road). There is also the Botany Aquatic Centre down the road. Local shops (post office, IGA, chemist, take away restaurants etc), are all very close by. Very pleasant and family friendly neighbourhood.
notes: We usually live in the house, so whenever we rent it out, our stuff is in some of the cupboards. But we leave room for our guests to put their own gear. Just as an FYI - this year we are puppy raising a guide dog. So there may be traces of dog fur around (downstairs area) despite a thorough clean.
transit: We are very close to Sydney Airport, and there are plenty of buses that stop round the corner from our house. They can take you to either the local Westfield shopping centre (Eastgardens), or in the opposite direction towards Green Square Train Station, Central Station, and into the City.

name: Beautiful & Cozy Pad Moments from Bondi Beach
summary: This beautiful and spacious 1-bed apartment will make you feel welcome and cozy. It is located just a four-minute walk to Bondi Beach and the bustle of Campbell Parade yet set on a quiet residential street offering the best of both worlds. The wooden floor and stylish interior will make your stay in Bondi even more comfortable and exciting.
space: The apartment offers ocean views through Hunter Sculpture Park from a purpose-built day bed where you can watch the world go by, and is perfectly positioned at the beginning of the famous Bondi to Bronte cliff walk. It’s just a two minute stroll to Bondi’s iconic outdoor Icebergs Pool, which is open to the public, and Bondi’s stunning sister beaches, Tamarama and Bronte are just a 10 and 15 minute walk away. With separate bedroom, sun-room, living space and kitchen/dining area, our place is perfect for friends, families, or couples who want to enjoy the space!
description: This beautiful and spacious 1-bed apartment will make you feel welcome and cozy. It is located just a four-minute walk to Bondi Beach and the bustle of Campbell Parade yet set on a quiet residential street offering the best of both worlds. The wooden floor and stylish interior will make your stay in Bondi even more comfortable and exciting. The apartment offers ocean views through Hunter Sculpture Park from a purpose-built day bed where you can watch the world go by, and is perfectly positioned at the beginning of the famous Bondi to Bronte cliff walk. It’s just a two minute stroll to Bondi’s iconic outdoor Icebergs Pool, which is open to the public, and Bondi’s stunning sister beaches, Tamarama and Bronte are just a 10 and 15 minute walk away. With separate bedroom, sun-room, living space and kitchen/dining area, our place is perfect for friends, families, or couples who want to enjoy the space! The apartment is within a communal block. Guests will have access to the entire apartment
neighborhood_overview: What can be said about Bondi? It’s home to Sydney’s most famous beach, great surf and in recent years has turned into one of the city’s hottest food and drink spots. Bondi Beach is as beloved for its laid-back bar scene and percolating cafes as it is for the backyard barbecues that fire up every weekend. Bondi and its surrounding beaches each have public barbecues to enjoy the splendour of the ocean with family and friends. Walk five minutes west from the beach and you’ll find quiet residential streets, small coffee spots and a vibe that encourages relaxation and rest.  You’re four minutes from Bondi Beach from our place and just two minutes to Bondi Icebergs, which is the start of the stunning Bondi to Bronte coastal walk and where the annual Sculpture by the Sea festival starts. If you seek to escape the buzz of Bondi for a day head to Bronte, the beach that time forgot, to enjoy its laid-back cafes, famous breakfast spots and natural rock pools.
notes: It’s worth noting Sydney does have a tropical climate, and so there may be a few bugs about - nothing that would negatively impact your stay though!
transit: Bondi Beach - 4 minute walk Bondi Junction Station - 16 minutes by bus Sydney CBD - 25 minutes by bus and train Darling Harbour - 35 minutes by train Harbour Bridge - 35 minutes by train Opera House - 35 minutes by train Centennial Park - 30 minutes by bus Airport - 50 minutes by bus
access: The apartment is within a communal block. Guests will have access to the entire apartment during their stay.
interaction: I will be contactable by email or telephone during your stay.
house_rules: - - Please treat the home as you would your own - - Please respect the neighbours, and do not make significant noise or play loud music after 10pm - - No parties - - If guests lock themselves out of the property OR they do not place keys in the lockbox at checkout, an $80 fee will apply. If a guest loses a set of keys during their stay, a $120 fee will apply
host_about:
Having lived in Bondi by its glorious surrounding ocean for the last 15 years, me
and my family (Mark and 18 month old Milly) have taken a ‘city’ change and
moved back to the UK, leaving our gorgeous apartment for you to enjoy. Oh how
we’ll miss the stunning surrounds of the Pacific and Bondi’s friendly café vibes,
but rest assured we’ll be back! In the meantime we hope you’ll enjoy our place
and its perfect location to all that Bondi, Tamarama and Bronte has to offer.

neighborhood_overview: Our house is located on the Pittwater end of Newport. The area is famous for its beaches and boating. There are lots of bush walking available too. Newport Village has some great cafes, restaurants and beautiful small boutiques, as well as all the basics like bakery, supermarket, butcher... The Newport is a fabulous bar/restaurant with lots to offer for all ages and it's only a few blocks from our house.  Avalon is the next suburb towards North with a lovely village that offers an arts and hippie chic feeling.  Palm Beach, the home of Summer's Bay is only 6 km North. Manly Beach is about 17km South.
transit: Newport only caters buses as Public Transport but it is very reliable, easy to use and direct ride to Sydney CBD and other parts. The L90 is the most used bus which operates between Palm Beach and Sydney CBD. Other buses are available too.
access: Keys will be delivered as arranged on booking.
interaction: We will not be interacting with guests apart from when dropping the keys off and collecting it back. We are, however, available and contactable at any time.

name: Cute studio in the heart of Surry Hills & Sydney!
summary: This apartment is located in the very heart of, and in the best part of, Surry Hills (near Taylor Square, Bourke St and Oxford St). Cosy, but fully appointed and with a brand new bathroom, this studio is a private oasis to explore Sydney! Built in the 1930s, the apartment is built from concrete providing great climate all year round and excellent noise insulation - even though you are in a vibrant neighbourhood, just footsteps to the Sydney CBD. It really has everything for a great stay!
space: There really is no location better than this. It's the very heart of Surry Hills, and is nicely renovated, including a brand new bathroom. The space is private, bright and airy and overlooks trendy Bourke St with views out to Oxford Street.

You have access to the entire private apartment, with your own kitchen and private bathroom and shower. The building has a shared laundry on each floor which costs $3 for each washing load and $3 for each drying load. The building is a security building with securit
neighborhood_overview: Surry Hills is the vibrant, trendy cultural capital of Sydney. Always something exciting happening somewhere, and always something do - any day of the week, and any time of day! And it's close to everything that matters. Walk to the city, universities, train and bus services and a supermarket seconds away. You're also no more than about 15 minutes drive from Sydney's favourite beach, Bondi.
notes: Please note that I can check you in from 1pm-8pm every day. I can do check-ins after 8pm, but there is a small charge associated with this - $44 - as I need to use a third party to do this!
transit: You'll be within easy walking distance of the Sydney CBD (5-10 minutes away), Oxford street which has major bus routes (2 minutes away) and Central Railway Station or Museum Train Station (each about 5-10 minutes walk away). Or you could just get one of Sydney's many cabs or Ubers to come directly to your door!
access: You have access to the entire private apartment, with your own kitchen and private bathroom and shower. The building has a shared laundry on each floor which costs $3 for each washing load and $3 for each drying load. The building is a security building with security cameras and swipe/key access only so is extremely secure. There is a caretaker onsite two days per week to keep things clean and safe.
interaction: I generally travel a lot for work, so am not always in town to meet my guests. name: High Cross Park Lodge - Queen Room
summary: High Cross Park Lodge in Randwick is a charming 1890 Victorian terrace opposite a park. The stylish boutique property is a 5-min walk to the Prince of Wales Hospital and the University of NSW (UNSW). Coogee Beach is only a 20-min walk away. The property is also near Allianz Stadium, Royal Randwick Racecourse, Sydney Cricket Ground, the Hordern Pavilion and numerous trendy cafes and restaurants down the street. Public transport is on our doorstep by with regular buses to the Sydney CBD & Bondi.
space: We pride ourselves in providing clean and comfortable accommodation, at great value for money in one of the world's best cities! :-) Being a heritage building, the rooms are smaller than some modern hotels but offer an atypical and charming stay without compromising the comfort of your stay with all essential onsite amenities. The Queen Rooms are fresh and modern. Featuring a queen-sized bed and private ensuite bathroom, the rooms also include air-conditioning, Wi-Fi (free up to 1GB/day), flat screen TV and small bar fridge with tea and coffee making facilities.

neighborhood_overview: High Cross Park Lodge’s home is located in Randwick, New South Wales, Australia. Head down to 'The Spot', around the corner for the evening, it is THE local ‘foodie hub’ with its buzzing atmosphere, numerous restaurants and bars. Discover the heritage-listed art deco cinema The Ritz Theatre, built in 1937.  The boutique property is also a short distance from Centennial Park, Coogee Beach, Bondi Coastal Walk and Randwick racecourse.
notes: Housekeeping is not included in the rate. If you would like housekeeping during your stay, please drop by Reception to learn about the associated fees
transit: Public transport is on our doorstep by with regular buses to the Sydney CBD and Bondi. The bus stop to the city is a 5 min walk. Follow Perouse Road to meet the intersection of Soudan Street and catch the bus at the stop 'Perouse Rd at Soudan St' (bus 373 or 377).  The light rail is under construction and will be running in the Randwick area by May 2020.
interaction: Reception is open 7 days a week, from 8:00 am – 7:00 pm so please drop-by for any questions or recommendations during your stay.

neighborhood_overview: Click 'Vy From The Collectionist's Guidebook' below for my local recommendations. The Collectionist is conveniently located just 10 minutes’ drive to the CBD in Camperdown.   Camperdown Commons, which houses Acre Restaurant, Spritz Bar and The Container Café; and Deus Café are within 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, offering guests a number of dining options for breakfast, lunch and dinner.  King Street’s array of restaurants, bars and cafes are also just 10 to 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel.   The University of Sydney and Royal Prince Alfred Hospital are within 5 to 10 minutes’ walk.
notes: Please remember that you're staying in a house, not a hotel. Please treat the space with respect. If any problems arise, we will do our best to take action ASAP, but there is no one living on site 24/7.
transit: I highly recommend using ride-sharing services: For $20 in Uber credit, use my code - iyql4 Turo is the Airbnb of car rentals. For $25 off, use code DANNYR380 Buses to, and from, the city are readily available from Parramatta Road (lines: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) - to bondi Junction, 461, M10) or also on Missenden Road (line 412), both roads are less than 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel.  Distance from Airport: 9km Either taxi/uber or train and bus to the hotel.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is only a 10 minute drive to the CBD, 10 minutes to the airport, 10 minutes to Moore Park (including the SCG) and within walking distance to the Danks Street precinct and to East Village shopping complex. Supermarkets, restaurants, cafes and transport are all at your doorstep.
transit: Green Square station is about a  10 minute walk and then it's only a 4 min journey to Central station (from there you can change trains to go anywhere). The same line however has two more stops throughout the CBD with the last stop being Circular Quay (which is where you will find the Opera House and Bridge). The journey from Green Square to Circular Quay is only 13 mins. There is also a number of bus stops within 1-2 mins walk from the apartment that will take you into the City (via Surry Hills) and all the way down to Circular Quay. Depending on the traffic this could take up to 30 mins (but is quicker if you travel outside of peak times). You will also find a bus stop within 5 mins walking that takes you straight to Bondi.
interaction: I am always available via phone throughout the course of your stay should you have any questions or issues.
house_rules: - Please keep noise to a minimum after 9:00pm on weeknights and 12:00am on weekends

name: Right at the beach. Modern North Bondi Apartment
summary: It’s hard to get closer to the beach than this modern, clean open plan with all the finishes. Located in a boutique art deco block this apartment has been recently renovated, tastefully styled and is the perfect place to enjoy after a day on the beach. Located on the first floor it's sunny, quiet and you can hear the Bondi waves. The feel is light, modern and comfortable. A short stroll will land you amongst a huge range of stylish cafes and world-class restaurants.
space: This light, good-sized modern two bedroom apartment is super conveniently located to the beach and everything else Bondi has to offer. The apartment has a fully equipped modern kitchen with cooktop, oven and an internal laundry with Bosch front loader washer. Two good sized bedrooms, main with large sunroom. A large open plan combined living and dining area. The apartment stays cool all summer with the sea breeze so close. The bathroom is modern and clean. There is WiFi internet and a smart TV. And access to an on site car space if required. This is a superb spot for the full Bondi Beach summer lifestyle experience.
description: It’s hard to get closer to the beach than this modern, clean open plan with all the finishes. Located in a boutique art deco block this apartment has been recently renovated, tastefully styled and is the perfect place to enjoy after a day on the beach. Located on the first floor it's sunny, quiet and you can hear the Bondi waves. The feel is light, modern and comfortable. A short stroll will land you amongst a huge range of stylish cafes and world-class restaurants. This light, good-sized modern two bedroom apartment is super conveniently located to the beach and everything else Bondi has to offer. The apartment has a fully equipped modern kitchen with cooktop, oven and an internal laundry with Bosch front loader washer. Two good sized bedrooms, main with large sunroom. A large open plan combined living and dining area. The apartment stays cool all summer with the sea breeze so close. The bathroom is modern and clean. There is WiFi internet and a smart TV. And access to an on site car
neighborhood_overview: Home to the world-famous Bondi Beach, the most ideal place to visit for any tourist! Everything is within walking distance.. the beach, local shops, wonderful grocers, weekend markets, and a dynamic food scene of cafes, restaurants, local australian pubs and wine bars. There are just so many options so explore and the challenge will be deciding. Check out the welcome manual when you arrive and if you need some extra help I’ve got plenty of tips or you can ask me.
notes: Please treat the home, our neighbours and the area with respect. We share this home with other Airbnb guests so thank you for treating our home like you would your own. Strictly no parties, remember to keep things relaxed when at the home, no excessive noise and if you want to party there are bars and clubs to enjoy all within walking distance.
transit: Most of the time you will enjoy to get around on foot (even barefoot for some). Transport is very convenient with public transport just around the corner. The bus service will connect you to Bondi Junction, other neighbouring suburbs and the city. At Bondi Junction you have the option of other trains and buses to connect to the CBD or other parts of Sydney. There are buses that also run to a number of amazing harbour bays, including Watsons Bay and Camp Cove. Sydney has a hop-on hop-off tourist bus service so you can experience Sydney and the famous harbour as well as Bondi beach with 33 stops on the Big Bus Sydney and Bondi Explorer. Other transport options are Uber, taxis or rental options such as GoGet. If biking is more your style, try bike sharing, download the app for either Reddy Go (red bike) and oBike (yellow bike) and check the app for a bike near you.
access: The main access to the apartment is from the front building and it's on level 1 of the complex so access is easy, up one flight of stairs.
interaction: I’m Anna, a local Bondi and I'm your host. I am a professional and dedicated local host who loves living in the area. Where possible I will meet and greet you at the home and I’m close by and contactable. As your host it’s my job to make sure you enjoy the home and the area. My level of interaction is totally up to you, I’m always close by. I can also provide concierge services so please reach out and ask. In the home you will find a welcome manual with more information on the home, tips on the area and my local recommendations.
house_rules: Thank you and welcome to our home! This home is in a residential area so please show respect at all times in the home and the neighbouring area. As your local host I am on hand so any questions or special requests please ask. Noise to a minimum between the hours of 10pm-8am. No parties, events, gatherings or disruptive behaviour of any kind. Don't loose your keys, replacement keys will incur a fee of $50.
host_location: Bondi Beach, New South Wales, Australia
host_about:
We live in one of the most incredibly friendly and community-minded neighbourhoods around - it's a truly fabulous lifestyle and a great place to live.  Aside from work, we live for the ocean, healthy lifestyle and great live music.  

This is an amazing place to live, I regularly have to pinch myself ... This is the first time we have listed our house on Airbnb. Enjoy

summary: Our sunny two bedroom apartment, located on the second storey of the main house has its own entrance and is completely private. Fully furnished and self-contained, the apartment has been recently renovated. Perfect for singles, couples or families. The apartment is approx 11km from Sydney CBD, located within walking distance to local shops and cafes and has easy access to buses and ferries. We are also lucky enough to live opposite a large park with a playground.

neighborhood_overview: There are two small shopping villages in walking distance, which are around 5-10 minutes walk away. They have everything you need - supermarket, Harris farm (fruit&veg/ deli), pharmacy, cafe, post office, etc.
transit: Parking: There is always plenty of free street parking right in front of the house. Buses: We are about a 300m walk from two bus stops which go straight to the CBD (approx 30 minutes on the bus - dependent on traffic). There are plenty of buses that go regularly all day until late at night.  Ferry: Huntley's Point Ferry Wharf is a 5 minute drive, which takes you to Barangaroo (15 minutes) or Circular Quay (30 minutes). Taxi/Uber: If you get a taxi/Uber it's about 15-20 minutes to the CBD (outside peak hour).

name: Heritage Listed ‘Inglenook’- Breakfast included
summary: Built in the early 1900's, 'Inglenook' is a unique place to stay... loads of character and with all modern comforts. Operating like a true B&B it includes a substantial self serve cold breakfast and bed linen supplied by a professional launderer. The 4 dedicated guest spaces are separated at the other end of the house from my own, and I’ll only take one booking at a time so you’ll have exclusive use of all these rooms with breakfast served in the beautiful dining room.
space: 'Inglenook' will provide you with all you need to put together your own cold breakfast with choices of cereals, breads and spreads along with bananas and freshly squeezed orange juice.  Also a selection of teas and pod coffee is available as often as you wish. Additional guests $40 AUD pp per night after the first 2 guests, which includes the self serve breakfast. Also if you'd like a hot cooked breakfast as well, this may be available upon request at an additional $15 per person.  Bedrooms 1 & 2 are upstairs, Bedroom 3 doubles as a guest lounge and is situated on the ground floor alongside the guests bathroom. Supplied is: A selection of teas and a Nespresso coffee machine in room. Bar fridge. Glass ware and mugs, cups etc Plates, bowls and cutlery if you choose to order a take away meal. Unlimited high speed wireless internet. 2 x TVs for guests (both with Apple TVs). Bluetooth speaker. Phone chargers in all rooms. Private deck with outdoor setting leading off upstairs bed room. Iron
description: Built in the early 1900's, 'Inglenook' is a unique place to stay... loads of character and with all modern comforts. Operating like a true B&B it includes a substantial self serve cold breakfast and bed linen supplied by a professional launderer. The 4 dedicated guest spaces are separated at the other end of the house from my own, and I’ll only take one booking at a time so you’ll have exclusive use of all these rooms with breakfast served in the beautiful dining room. 'Inglenook' will provide you with all you need to put together your own cold breakfast with choices of cereals, breads and spreads along with bananas and freshly squeezed orange juice.  Also a selection of teas and pod coffee is available as often as you wish. Additional guests $40 AUD pp per night after the first 2 guests, which includes the self serve breakfast. Also if you'd like a hot cooked breakfast as well, this may be available upon request at an additional $15 per person.  Bedrooms 1 & 2 are upstairs, Bedroom 3
neighborhood_overview: Inglenook is only 900 metres from Hornsby Station and bus terminal plus all that Hornsby Shire has to offer.... shopping, cinemas, mountain bike trails, tennis courts, golf course, bush walks and the aquatic centre. And if you want to stroll down the road for dinner, it’s an easy walk... you won’t have to worry about having those few drinks with lunch or dinner!
notes: NOTE: For parents with young children: 2 of the bedrooms are up two flights of stairs (19 steps in total). If young kids are staying please be advised there are no filler panels below the handrail of the staircase, (see photos) and there is also a high balcony and in bedroom 2 upstairs. So if your kids like to climb, Inglenook might not be suitable for you. However, I do have a child proof barricade which can be installed at one of the bedroom doors.
transit: From Inglenook... It takes about 10 mins to walk the level 900 metres to Hornsby Station. Train into Sydney CBD takes 42 mins (all stops) or 30 mins by express. Hornsby Hospital is about 3 minute drive away. Sections of the Great NorthWalk and trails in the  Berowra Valley Bushland reserve are only 1 kilometre away. The  beautiful Hawkesbury River is a 25 minute car or train trip.  Bobbin Head in the Kuring-Gai  Chase National Park, known for picnics, fishing, and boating is a 15 min drive. The Northern beaches are approx 30 minutes and the Central Coast beaches are a 60 minute drive. Nearest golf course is a 5 min drive.  Hornsby Mountain bike trails are 1 kilometre away.
access: Since Inglenook operates solely as a B&B the kitchen can’t be used for guests to prepare meals or store food etc, although you are most welcome to join me for a chat as I spend quite a bit of time in there : ) * There is a bar fridge in bedroom 2 for guests. The bedrooms only have coffee and side tables, so you are welcome to access my home office for laptop use if you need. If you would like to use the laundry,  a gold coin donation, would be much appreciated.
interaction: I'm happy to have as much or as little interaction as you would like.
house_rules: #NAME?
host_about: I have always loved entertaining, travel and meeting new people so I think Air B&B is the perfect fit for me. I also run a small graphic design business from my home which enables me to be flexible in looking after my pets and also my guests.

name: Large family home in Darlington
summary: Our 3 storey 10 bedroom (we only rent out one bedroom) home started out life in 1880 as The City View Hotel and operated as a pub until the 1970's when it became a private hotel. In the 1980's Sydney Uni converted it to student accommodation until 2005 when we took it on.
space: We only rent out one room so you will not be sharing the house with other quests. The accommodation is a very large high ceiling room on the top/third floor of the house. It has 3 large windows with views to the city and Sydney University. One of the bedrooms on the top floor has been converted to a sitting room for guests; it has a fridge, basic cooking and coffee/tea making facilities.

neighborhood_overview: Darlington is very close to the Sydney CBD, Darling Harbour, Sydney Fish Markets, Newtown and Glebe. There are many pubs, restaurants and cafes within easy walking distance.
notes: If you are into running, come with us and our huskies on an early morning run. We can show you around Darling Harbour, Black Wattle Bay, Balmain and the Fish Markets.
transit: Redfern Railway Station (one stop from Central Railway Station) is 2 minutes walk which gives access to the whole Sydney rail network. Buses run along Cleveland Street (2 minutes walk) and Broadway (8 minutes). Depending on traffic, a taxi is $30-$40 from the domestic airport and $40-50 from the international airport. Taxi costs about $15 to the city or under $5 by bus. Bondi Beach is 40mins away by train with a short bus ride.

name: Luxury Waterfront Apt - Best Loc to stay in Sydney
summary: Perfect for corporate, holiday, temporary accommodation, and romantic getaways for couples at any age, this 1 bedroom + Study fully furnished apartment offers an unique experiences and comfortable stay for those who wants homey feel yet stylish and even a bit of luxury resort feel in the middle of an ordinary lives. We are aiming to accomodate all our guest to meet their needs for any occassions when you are away from home.
space: Tastefully furnished throughout, the apartment also has some fantastic views of the surroundings and water views on offer(Parramatta River).  For those early birds, it is the best place to jog by the river every morning to the famous Australian Landmark; Sydney Olympic Park by foot and perhaps a gourmet coffee afterwards at our balcony overlooking the river could be your daily morning routine when you are staying at our place.

host_about:
유칼립투스 레지던스에 오신것을 환영합니다.

시드니 방문시에는 언제나 유칼립투스를 이용하세요.

로즈 (RHODES)란 곳은 시드니 시내로 부터 약 25분 거리에 위치하고 있으며, 한인타운과는 모두 10분이내로 시드니 최적의 교통 수단을 자랑 합니다. 
기차, 페리, GoGet (카 렌탈) 에 이르기 까지 모두 도보 3분 거리에 있으며, 다양한 먹거리와 메이져 쇼핑센터 또한 도보 5분 거리에 있습니다.
또한, 시드니에서 가장 큰 올림픽 파크와도 5분 거리에 있으며, 파라마타 강변을 따른 산책로 또한 바로 집 앞 발코니에서 시작됩니다.   


저희 유칼립투스 트리에서는 아래 모든 것을 즐길 수 있습니다.
내 집 발코니에서의 BBQ 파티, 미니멀 한 인테리어에서의 로맨틱하고 편안한 휴식, 강변로 산책, 최고의 교통 요충지, 한식을 포함한 인터네셔널 먹거리, 모든 것을 쉽고 편안하게 해결 할 수 있습니다. 
또한 근거리에 골프장, 낚시터 등, 천혜의 자연 환경을 자랑하는 호주에서 할 수 있는 모든 것을 현지인 처럼 누리고 가세요. 

모든 것이 편리하고, 내 집 같이 편안한 유칼립투스 트리 레지던스는 에어비엔비 수퍼 호스트로서 교포 한인 1세가 직접 운영하는 3곳 중 하나입니다.  

고국으로 부터의 친지 방문, 소규모 관광, 가족/연인들의 특별한 이벤트를 위한 안락한 휴식처 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 유칼립투스 레지던스에서 잊지못 할 추억을 만들어 가세요. 




Ace KIM@AirBnB

name: Lovely, contemporary studio in Surry Hills
summary: My place is right in the middle of the brilliant cafes, restaurants and night life in Surry Hills, and a short 5-10 minute walk to the centre of Sydney City and all its attractions and transport. The apartment has everything you need to live, eat and rest for a short or long stay. Ideal for solo travellers, couples and business people!
space: The apartment is bright and airy. Cosy, tidy and clean, with bed, linen (replaced for you after each guest), towels, and basics in the kitchen (cooking utensils, pots, pans, plates, cups, cutlery etc) and basics for cooking as well, like oils, salt and pepper etc. The bathroom is small but fully featured and the air conditioning will keep you cool in summer and warm in winter!

The apartment is private and just for your use, including the kitchen and bathroom. There is also a shared laundry in the basement of the building with washing and drying for a small fee (just a few dollars for each load). I am not often around in Sydney. If you've selected to chec
neighborhood_overview: Surry Hills is one of the most vibrant areas in inner Sydney. With cafes, bars, grocery stores, fitness centres and tourist attractions everywhere you go! It's one of the most central parts of Sydney without having to be in the concrete jungle of Sydney's central business district!
notes: Please note that I can check you in from 1pm onwards every day. For check-ins between 1pm-8pm, I can do an in-person check-in (facilitated by my cleaners and helpers Vanessa and Glaucia). Alternatively, I can also do check-ins with a lock-box from 1pm until late on your day of arrival if you like! This is often easier and more convenient for guests, I've found! Check-ins after 8pm can only be via the lock-box method!
transit: Public Transport is right at your door step - with Central Station, Museum Station nearby for trains, buses running up and down Oxford Street (which is a 2 minute walk away), and ubers and cabs within seconds. You can also walk to the Sydney CBD and Oxford Street in just a few minutes!
access: The apartment is private and just for your use, including the kitchen and bathroom. There is also a shared laundry in the basement of the building with washing and drying for a small fee (just a few dollars for each load).
interaction: I am not often around in Sydney. If you've selected to check-in via the lock-box method, I'll send you simple instructions to find and access the lock box and then the apartment! If you'd like to check in in person, my cleaners and helpers, Vanessa and Glaucia, will check you in and show you what the apartment has to offer. They are terrific and helpful and will do everything needed to help you settle in :)

host_about:
I absolutely love living in Avalon close to the beach and am very excited to be able to share our piece of paradise with the travelling public.
I am married to my Canadian husband Ron whom I met whilst travelling in Europe many years ago. 
We have four adult children, 2 currently living OS and a beautiful old Labrador dog Rubi. 
Our family has been very fortunate to have travelled extensively over the years and lived in Canada and the US for lengthy periods. 
Health, fitness and good nutrition are my passion .
Enjoy meeting new people, socialising with friends and caring for the elderly in my job as an RN massage therapist.

The apartment has 1 bedroom with a queen size bed, a bathroom and a living room with kitchen. There are two balconies, one small and cute, and the other is very spacious and sunny.

There is a communal laundry in the first floor of the building, which can be used with coins.

host_about: I am a university lecture working in research and teaching.  Originally from Colombia but I have been living in Sydney since the year 2000 when I came to pursue my PhD studies. I enjoy the outdoors life that this beautiful city offer, so I ride my bike almost every day and love to play beach volleyball end enjoy Sydney beaches on the weekend.  I practice yoga, gym and love reading at night with a glass of wine and chocolate. Sometimes I organize dinner parties to share with friend and sometimes I enjoy Sydney’s night life on weekends.

summary: Treat yourself to a stay at this beautiful two bedroom apartment and mesmerise in the picturesque views of City, Parramatta River and Bicentennial Park. space: Our comfortable and modern apartment is perfect for Business Travellers, Families and Groups. Suitable for up to 4 adults and extra 2 children. The apartment is abundant with natural light and stunning views of Sydney City Skyline, Parramatta River and Bicentennial Park from all bedrooms, living room and winter garden. Two bedrooms are fully equipped with queen size beds, built in wardrobe and access to private balcony, third bedroom is equipped with two single beds. The master bedroom has an ensuite. Study room has a pulled out sofa bed for extra guests. Dinning area has a vintage solid wood dinning table with 6 seats. The Living Room has a 4 seater lounge and a spinning armchair with a Smart TV. Fast fibre Wi-Fi and Air Conditioning throughout the entire apartment.

house_rules: IMPORTANT NOTICE: PLEASE READ BEFORE BOOKING WE HAVE A PREFERENCE FOR A MINIMUM OF 5 NIGHT STAY. IF YOUR BOOKING IS FOR LESS THAN 5 NIGHTS, please contact us before making your booking/reservation by clicking "Contact Host" located on the first page of the ad under "About this Listing" section. We do take shorter bookings than 5 nights provided we can back to back your booking with another.  Please contact us before making your booking/reservation. Our instant book facility is for a maximum of 2 adults and 2 kids (under 15 yrs old). If your stay is for less than 5 nights or the number of adults in your party exceeds 2, and you reserve without first contacting the host, by clicking Next and making the reservation, you agree to cancel this reservation at your own cost, if we request that you cancel the reservation. If we do ask you to cancel, we agree to refund to you all payouts made to us by Airbnb associated with the cancellation.
host_about:
We are locals and adore Bronte!   We are truly thankful that we live in this part of the world and grateful that we have the opportunity to share our properties at Bronte with our Airbnb guests.

We also manage a property at Chippendale for our mom. We love the buzz that Chippendale has to offer.  Kensington St is amazing particularly at night!

name: Stylishly Radiant Bondi Beach Pad
summary: Welcome to Sydney and Australia’s famous Bondi Beach, as our apartment becomes your home for a little while. You won’t be disappointed in the location, 3min walk from a bus to Bondi Juntion/ the City or 8min walk down Hall Street to the heart of Bondi, and of course the BEACH! You’ll love staying in this newly renovated art deco apartment with beautiful hardwood floors, new kitchen for all your cooking desires and is always radiant with light.  Enjoy :)
space: The apartment is set in a beautiful quite art deco building, which is minutes walk from Bondi Beach or public transport to the city. It is newly renovated, so clean and tidy, perfect for a home base if you are exploring each day or just wanting to hang out and watch Netflix on the couch. There is a master bedroom with a queen bed, and plenty of storage space and a second bedroom with a single bed that pulls out to a queen bed.  There is a kitchen with everything you need, with a dining table for 6 people. In the living room we have a sofa that pulls into a double bed.  Also enjoy the place inside and out, with a little balcony to enjoy your breakfast on in the morning.  There is a public laundry area in the complex, with a washing machine only (no dryer) that is coin operated, with a clothes line out the back to hand your items out to dry. We only have a single bathroom, with a shower and a beautiful bath tub.

neighborhood_overview: Bondi is the worlds most famous Beach for a reason. Beautiful people, food, parks, walks, everything! Some of the nicest restaurants in Sydney are just mins walk away from the apartment.
notes: Cleaning fee note: We use professional cleaners and provide hotel quality linen for all sleeping surfaces that is guaranteed to be fresh and clean. If you have any issues with cleanliness when you arrive please let us know straight away and we will fix the issue. There is a communal washing machine for a few $, but no dryer, but there are clothes lines out the back.
transit: If you are driving, there is only 2hr parking on Wellington Street, otherwise, there are some all day spots on Blair Street or Warner Ave.  Be sure to check the signs. If you are looking to grab public transport, there is a bus spot on O'Brien Street that will take you to Bondi Junction (catch trains from there) or to the City, or into Bondi as well. Otherwise, Uber's run hard and fast around Bondi.
access: You will have the entire apartment to yourself.
interaction: I'm close by if you need me, otherwise, you will have your privacy.

name: Luxurious and intimate STUDIO in Paddington
summary: Freshly renovated and positioned right in the middle of Paddington on Oxford Street. It is an intimate studio that is fitted with prime appliances and luxurious decor. It’s best suited for a couple or single occupancy. The building has a cafe on the ground floor, bus stop is at the front, pharmacy across the street and various grocery and speciality stores right at your doorstep.  There is a pool on the roof of the building with spectacular views of the CBD. Alliance Stadium is a 5 minute walk.
space: The positioning of the studio is superb and should suit every traveler: close to CBD, Kings Cross, multiple beaches (Bondi, Bronte, Coogee), Alliance Stadium and much more. The studio is self sufficient with cooking facilities (cooktop, microwave, coffee machine, toaster), washer/dryer, fridge, iron, TV and high speed WiFi. There are several grocery stores within a 5 minute radius, bottle shops and an endless choice of Paddo pubs and restaurants.

notes: I can offer (advanced notice) grocery shopping service, laundry or cleaning of the apartment during an extended stay. Service is at an extra cost which can be negotiated.

neighborhood_overview: Our place is part of a row of heritage listed apartments, located in the heart of Sydney's historic Miller's Point district. Our area was a thriving port town for much of the 1800s and 1900s, it has long been a place of commerce and community. Today, our area contrasts the modern neighbouring CBD cityscape with quaint character homes, creating a diverse and vibrant address.
notes: We have other 3 2brm unit in the same building listed. There are secure parking options very close by.  1. Wilson Parking Barangaroo Reserve Car Park (5min walk) 2. Secure Parking Amora Hotel Car Park (9min walk) As Barangaroo is currently being constructed for the underground railway station. Please note the potential noise resulting from this.

name: Magical Mosman home and pool awaits you.....
summary: Enjoy your Sydney holiday in the stunning suburb of Mosman. Centrally located. Close to Sydney's greatest assets - Taronga Zoo, Balmoral Beach, Downtown Sydney & Darling Harbour, Manly Beach. Or you can simply relax by our beautiful pool!
space: Our home is our haven. We love to garden, swim in the pool, entertain and relax. We are a family of three generations and are extremely house proud! Our much loved home is light, bright and airy. You will be sure to enjoy our quintessential Sydney home as much as we do....come and see!
description: Enjoy your Sydney holiday in the stunning suburb of Mosman. Centrally located. Close to Sydney's greatest assets - Taronga Zoo, Balmoral Beach, Downtown Sydney & Darling Harbour, Manly Beach. Or you can simply relax by our beautiful pool! Our home is our haven. We love to garden, swim in the pool, entertain and relax. We are a family of three generations and are extremely house proud! Our much loved home is light, bright and airy. You will be sure to enjoy our quintessential Sydney home as much as we do....come and see! Our stylish, contemporary guest accommodation has three bedrooms, an airy living space, kitchen and a front terrace with expansive district and water views. The stunning garden area includes a salt water pool. Lots of options to relax and unwind. As our home is a duplex, there is usually someone one site to assist you with your stay. Alternatively, we have nearby neighbours to warmly welcome you and assist with any questions you might have about your stay in our home. O
neighborhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is quiet, friendly and so convenient. We are located on a bus route, with direct access to Sydney's city and business district....only 15 minutes away. We are minutes from gorgeous Balmoral Beach and a short drive across to Manly Beach and the Northern Beaches peninsular.
transit: If you have a car, on-street parking is plentiful. We are located on the 243 bus route to the city and local shopping precincts. Mosman Bay wharf is nearby, for a ferry ride into the city or across to Taronga Zoo. The options are plentiful. We are approximately 25 minutes drive from Sydney international and domestic airport.
access: Our stylish, contemporary guest accommodation has three bedrooms, an airy living space, kitchen and a front terrace with expansive district and water views. The stunning garden area includes a salt water pool. Lots of options to relax and unwind.

name: Beautiful Avalon Peninsula Retreat
summary: ‘Coolawin’ is a beautiful oasis located within a 5 minute walk to pretty Avalon Village and the beach.   Expansive green lawns and pretty trees surround the large property.   Features include the high ceiling open plan living space that opens out on to flowing decks and a sparkling pool.  Adjacent is a to self contained studio-outhouse; the ideal teen retreat.  This is the perfect family holiday close enough to everything yet far enough away to be able to relax, unwind & retreat from daily life.
space: Enjoy all the great spaces our place has to offer Outdoors - sparkling pool & outdoor heated shower, large decks and lawns Outhouse - with own kitchenette, bathroom, tv and ideal for adults, teens and kids alike w sofa beds Main House, Upstairs Large living area flowing out on to decks, ideal for entertaining with BBQ and Weber. Media room if wanting to work or just read a book. 4 Bedrooms ( 3 with Queens / 1 with twin king singles) 3 Bathrooms Downstairs  Laundry Large Family Room flowing out on to back lawns.

name: Funky Central Studio Apartment with Rooftop
summary: This funky and comfortable studio apartment is located on one of the most famous streets in Sydney. This street is full of life including vibrant clubs, intimate bars and charming restaurants. The apartment is one minute from the bus stop and ten minutes walk from the station. It has a fully functioning kitchen with a gas stove and dishwasher. The rooftop has a beautiful view of the city and Sydney harbour. Have fun and enjoy your stay in the best, and most interesting, part of Sydney.

name: Gemstay Studio near Dee Why Beach and Manly
summary: Gemstay is a pristine, bright and airy studio apartment with its own private entrance off a deck and terrace. It is set in a quiet neighbourhood with extensive views and is close to beaches, bustling restaurants, bars and public transport.
space: Gemstay is a self contained studio with high quality appointments. It has its own kitchen and has laundry facilities (washer and dryer) within the bathroom. It is designed for a couple with a queen size bed. The mattress can be easily raised for under bed storage suitable for luggage (use hand grips at the corner of the mattress base...hydraulic lift). In this storage area a clothes airer and fold-up table are provided. An additional comfortable auto inflatable mattress is available. A travel cot suitable for infants and toddlers is also available on request. Our guests will have an enjoyable independent living experience.
description: Gemstay is a pristine, bright and airy studio apartment with its own private entrance off a deck and terrace. It is set in a quiet neighbourhood with extensive views and is close to beaches, bustling restaurants, bars and public transport. Gemstay is a self contained studio with high quality appointments. It has its own kitchen and has laundry facilities (washer and dryer) within the bathroom. It is designed for a couple with a queen size bed. The mattress can be easily raised for under bed storage suitable for luggage (use hand grips at the corner of the mattress base...hydraulic lift). In this storage area a clothes airer and fold-up table are provided. An additional comfortable auto inflatable mattress is available. A travel cot suitable for infants and toddlers is also available on request. Our guests will have an enjoyable independent living experience. In addition to the studio, deck and terrace, guests will have limited access to a pool and spa deck located at the rear of the pr
neighborhood_overview: North Curl Curl is a quiet area in the heart of the Northern Beaches which is popular for its relaxed lifestyle and its famous surfing beaches as well as a myriad of restaurants, bars, parks and shopping centres. Apart from strolling along the sands of the surf beaches there is a beautiful cliff side boardwalk at South Curl Curl or a walkway around Curl Curl lagoon.
notes: Key: If we are not at home key access is via the lockbox on garage wall at the bottom of the stairs.  Linen: 1 bath towel per guest and 1 set of sheets per bed during your stay. Cleaning: Detergent, wipes and dustpan are under the kitchen sink.   Rubbish: Minibins are provided in the kitchen and bathroom. 3 larger recycling bins are situated outside on the deck - one for bottles, cans and cartons, one for paper and cardboard and the other for general household rubbish. Your host will clear the rubbish in the recycling bins each Wednesday or as required, for council pick up on Thursday.  A small medical kit and iron are located in the bathroom cabinet. An ironing board is stored beside the fridge.
transit: It's an easy walk to beaches and restaurants, and just 250m to the bus stop for travelling direct to the city. Or take the bus to iconic Manly and continue on a relaxing ferry trip across beautiful Sydney harbour, past the Opera House and Sydney Harbour Bridge, and on to the city. (Check bus and ferry timetables.)
access: In addition to the studio, deck and terrace, guests will have limited access to a pool and spa deck located at the rear of the property. It has panoramic ocean and district views and is in a tropical setting overlooked by several stands of palm trees. The pool will be available from 7am to 7pm and may be shared with friends and family of the hosts. However there will be occasions where the pool area will be closed due to maintenance and access will be not allowed.
interaction: We live on site and are happy to help our guests with advice on getting around, dining and enjoying the beautiful nearby beaches. At the same time, we respect the privacy of our guests so they can decide how much interaction they wish to have with us as hosts. The studio is completely separate from the rest of the house and so offers privacy and independent living.
house_rules: •Smoking not permitted on the property.  •Courteous and polite behaviour is expected. Please    be mindful of our neighbours and keep noise to a   minimum. •Parties or social gatherings are not permitted. •Shared access to spa and pool deck 7am-7pm subject to availability (On arrival, guests should notify the host if they wish to use the pool during their stay). Please note that children must be supervised by an adult at all times.  •Unfortunately pets are not allowed.  •No illegal downloads from the internet. •Please leave the studio in a clean and tidy condition. Note that it is not necessary to make the bed as all bed linen will be replaced prior to the     next guest. •Lastly, RELAX and ENJOY!
host_about: You will often find me at local shops or markets with girlfriends or walking along our beautiful beach-side cliff and park tracks with a cappuccino fix at the end. Family and friends are very important to me and travelling overseas is always fun. I love teaching little kids, watching them absorbing knowledge and helping them to develop skills for living and learning. I enjoy listening to 70's music and curling up to immerse myself in a thrilling movie or a trashy mystery/romance novel.

name: Sun Filled Top Floor Apartment
summary: Hello, renting out my cozy and homely two bedroom apartment (except my room :)) while I am away.  Great central location - 10 minute walk to UNSW, 2 minute walk to bus stops taking you to all parts of beautiful Sydney eg. the city, the beaches.
space: My abode very comfortably accommodates 2 people, however, there's also a single sofa bed in the lounge room so if needed a third person can stay (for an extra $30/night) so long as they are fine to sleep in the lounge room, just let me know! Also, am flexible with dates, if you need to stay a night earlier or later, just let me know, I will be leaving town early Tuesday, back Saturday evening.
description: Hello, renting out my cozy and homely two bedroom apartment (except my room :)) while I am away.  Great central location - 10 minute walk to UNSW, 2 minute walk to bus stops taking you to all parts of beautiful Sydney eg. the city, the beaches. My abode very comfortably accommodates 2 people, however, there's also a single sofa bed in the lounge room so if needed a third person can stay (for an extra $30/night) so long as they are fine to sleep in the lounge room, just let me know! Also, am flexible with dates, if you need to stay a night earlier or later, just let me know, I will be leaving town early Tuesday, back Saturday evening. I'm keeping my room off limits but do make yourself at home in the rest of the apartment ie. full use of the kitchen, bathroom and laundry facilities (private, not shared). The washing machine is downstairs in my garage. I'll be away early Tuesday morning, and back around 7pm Saturday evening.  Would love to meet you if possible though!   Great central inn
neighborhood_overview: Great central inner city location yet peaceful surrounds.  Supermarket, and lots of great little restaurants, mostly Asian, that are walking distance.
notes: Just to let you know, I'm on the top floor so up 3 flights of stairs, worth it though for the sun filled aspect and daily exercise. :)
transit: There's actually a direct bus (400/410) that takes you to and from the domestic and international airports to my suburb.  And from there it's just a 2 minute walk to my apartment.
access: I'm keeping my room off limits but do make yourself at home in the rest of the apartment ie. full use of the kitchen, bathroom and laundry facilities (private, not shared). The washing machine is downstairs in my garage.
interaction: I'll be away early Tuesday morning, and back around 7pm Saturday evening.  Would love to meet you if possible though!
house_rules: No smoking, drugs or alcohol in the home please, thank you.   I live a holistically healthy lifestyle to the best of my ability and would love the same with my guests. No pets either, unfortunately!
host_about:
Hello everyone, I love living a simple holistically healthy lifestyle - from the wholesome foods I eat to what I feel and think  - it all adds to make up our lives afterall!  I also love getting to know people so when I found out about Airbnb and it's people first approach to finding and hosting accommodation I wanted to join it for sure.
My life motto would be it's all about TLC - tender loving care - for yourself first so you can then share that yummy feeling with others too.

name: Kogarah 3 Bedroom 1 Bathroom House
summary: My place is close to St George hospital (500 metres), and Brighton Le Sands Beach (1500 metres). My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, families (with kids), big groups, and furry friends (pets).

My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, families (with kids), big groups, and furry friends (pets). Guests of this house have free access to the fully fenced pool located in the same complex. There is free visitors parking next to the pool, and also some parking spaces in the rear lane behind the house. Also plenty of free parking on the local streets if the above are not available. Cot, high chair and stroller are available at an additional cost of AU$18 per night. Wifi is limited to 1GB per day usage.

name: Comfortable, convenient, affordable- all you need!
summary: Lovely and bright, sunshine filled two bedroom apartment available for a short time. 20 minutes from the CBD, great Sydney Harbour views from the grounds, and terrific transport. All you need for a comfortable convenient holiday in Sydney.  Please click on the option below to 'see other reviews'  and descriptions from all the guests who stayed with me when I listed previously.  I have a 5 star rating. Transport is excellent-bus 5 minutes, ferry ten minutes and trains 20 minutes.
space: There are stunning views of Sydney Harbour from my carpark (not from my unit). It's an older style, small unit but very comfortable and priced accordingly. It's also very convenient to public transport and close to the city. Please note - Unfortunately there are no laundry facilities available.
description: Lovely and bright, sunshine filled two bedroom apartment available for a short time. 20 minutes from the CBD, great Sydney Harbour views from the grounds, and terrific transport. All you need for a comfortable convenient holiday in Sydney.  Please click on the option below to 'see other reviews'  and descriptions from all the guests who stayed with me when I listed previously.  I have a 5 star rating. Transport is excellent-bus 5 minutes, ferry ten minutes and trains 20 minutes. There are stunning views of Sydney Harbour from my carpark (not from my unit). It's an older style, small unit but very comfortable and priced accordingly. It's also very convenient to public transport and close to the city. Please note - Unfortunately there are no laundry facilities available. All areas. I will not be there when you stay.  No laundry sorry. I'm away but contactable by phone at any time. Neutral Bay is a lovely neighbourhood with lots of great cafe's,  restaurants and bars, as well as services.
neighborhood_overview: Neutral Bay is a lovely neighbourhood with lots of great cafe's,  restaurants and bars, as well as services. Its a very pretty, clean and vibrant place and it's very safe. You can walk anywhere at night with no risk. You can easily walk everywhere locally and find whatever you need.  There's a large supermarket 5 minutes walk away and there's a lovely little community club across the road for quick affordable meals.  You can buy supplies and cook at home as well.
notes: Not suitable for a child under 12.  Sorry - it's just too small and everything is cream or beige so a young child just won't work out.  Teens might feel a bit cramped too as it's a small space. There is a TV in the second bedroom that could be a life saver :) or bring a laptop for Netflix access. There are laundries in the building but you will not have access as I do not pay the crazy fees charged to access them sorry.  There is a self-service laundromat at 43A Spofforth St Cremorne (20-minute walk) or the dry cleaners or Neutral Bay Dry Cleaners 69 Military Rd Neutral Bay will do a bag wash for you.
transit: Transport is excellent. Walk North 5 minutes to a bus stop with very frequent buses into the city.  It connects with the rail network as well if you are travelling to the Blue Mountains etc. You can catch a bus to  Manly Beach or Bondi Beach from here as well.
access: All areas. I will not be there when you stay.  No laundry sorry.
interaction: I'm away but contactable by phone at any time.
house_rules: Not suited to Children under 8 years. With beige carpet and brand new leather lounge, Im afraid my place is not set up for children at all. There is no setting for this age group with airbnb.  Im afraid I can only accept guests with previous good reviews and sound profiles as I will be away at the time. Please don't book if this is your first Airbnb  booking as I wont be able to accept.  I also only accept guests with very good star ratings.
host_location: Neutral Bay, New South Wales, Australia
host_about:
Seasoned traveller with a keen interest in people and places. Friendly, easy going and happy to work out a great holiday plan with Sydney visitors. 

I'm an active fun-loving person who is always interested in trying something new - hence my adventure into hosting here on Airbnb.

I love Sydney! Festivals, fairs, beaches, harbour walks, galleries and theatre - we are truly blessed with the options we have available to us. I make the most of all of it with my fabulous friends and family.

name: Retreat in Chic Cozy 2BR APT - ❤️ of SYD CBD
summary: LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION !!!  Explore and live like a local in Surry Hills which ranks as the 23rd most stylish neighborhood in the world & No.1 in Australia! If you are looking for an amazing apartment in the best location in SYDNEY CBD look no further. Step outside to the vibrant and colourful Elizabeth St with easy 3 min walk to Central Station, Chinatown, Darling Harbour, World Square and short stroll to Opera House & the Rocks. 2 Bedrooms + Double Sofa Bed, 1 Bathroom, Free Wifi.
space: This is without doubt THE BEST LOCATION you could ever ask for when visiting Sydney. Surry Hills is an amazing inner city neighbourhood in Sydney's Eastern Suburbs, recently voted 23rd most sytlish suburb in the world! Incredibly relaxed place, great facilities including a start of the art new library, awesome bars, cafes & restaurants. 2 minute walk to everything that is wonderful and local in the inner-city village of Surry Hills, and a short walk further to Sydney's CBD, Hyde Park or Centennial Park. Across the road from the iconic Sydney Cricket Ground and other sporting venues, 15 minutes to Sydney's beautiful eastern suburbs beaches including the world famous Bondi Beach. Start your day with a coffee at the amazing Bourke Street Bakery just few minutes away. Fantastic mix of creative types, families, professionals & interesting locals :-) You will love it here. While in the neighbourhood, be sure to enjoy a well-known Sydney pub, there are many to choose from! Enjoy a meal at one
description: LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION !!!  Explore and live like a local in Surry Hills which ranks as the 23rd most stylish neighborhood in the world & No.1 in Australia! If you are looking for an amazing apartment in the best location in SYDNEY CBD look no further. Step outside to the vibrant and colourful Elizabeth St with easy 3 min walk to Central Station, Chinatown, Darling Harbour, World Square and short stroll to Opera House & the Rocks. 2 Bedrooms + Double Sofa Bed, 1 Bathroom, Free Wifi. This is without doubt THE BEST LOCATION you could ever ask for when visiting Sydney. Surry Hills is an amazing inner city neighbourhood in Sydney's Eastern Suburbs, recently voted 23rd most sytlish suburb in the world! Incredibly relaxed place, great facilities including a start of the art new library, awesome bars, cafes & restaurants. 2 minute walk to everything that is wonderful and local in the inner-city village of Surry Hills, and a short walk further to Sydney's CBD, Hyde Park or Centennial Park.
neighborhood_overview: Surry Hills is just 1km South-East of Sydney city and the area has an abundance of restaurants, pubs, cafes, shopping and parks. Great coffee! Fabulous shops to explore, and local places to dine, you will love living locally or enjoy the location for easy access to all of Sydney. You are within walking distance to Central Station, CBD, Oxford St and Circular Quay. With great public transport links, grab an Opal Card and get to Bondi Beach, Centennial Park and enjoy Sydney. More information Central PIZZA is right next to our building if you're too hungry :)
notes: NOTE: Please take off your shoes at the entrance and please leave the apartment clean and tidy as when you first find it. We really appreciate your courtesy! Take advantage of our LATEST PROMOTION and SPECIAL OFFERS and make your stay with us truly unique! Book early to secure your accommodation because we are often booked out during this period. Sydney is a bustling city and we're located right in the heart of it (which is part of the reasons why we love it!) so noise is inevitable. There is a construction going on from the right hand side of the complex so you might hear some noise during the day but hopefully it won’t affect you much as you’ll be exploring Sydney during daytime. This pad accommodates 4 adults comfortably but a max of 6 overnight. Any more than 4 adult guests overnight or extra sofa will attract an extra AU$30 per night, per additional guest. The sleeping arrangement for the 5th to 6th adult would be on a 2-seater sofa bed which folds out to a double with extra quilt
transit: 2 minutes walk to Central train station and bus interchange this apartment is perfectly located to get around Sydney. Leave the car and just walk everywhere! The City Centre is a 3 minute walk, Sydney Opera House 20 minutes and the Botanical Gardens 25 minutes. If you want to go further afield or just prefer public transport there are several bus stops within a 5 minute walk, which can take you around Sydney, including to Circular Quay, Bondi Beach or Centennial Park and of course you can get anywhere from Central train station. All public transport is close by. On street parking is available and the airport is literally 15 minutes away by cab or train.
access: Everything is yours to enjoy so treat the apartment as your own. Up to 1 x Key Fob and apartment keys will be given to each party or individual to access the apartment, and I will meet you in person or make suitable arrangements if I can not make it. FAMILY & CHILD-FRIENDLY Accommodation! Baby travel cot, high baby chair and stroller can be provided at additional cost. There is also a laundry/dry cleaners below and they're amazing at ironing! and you can store bags at this location before and after you check in and out. There is no left luggage or luggage storage available at the property before you check in and after you check out. There is a Storage Service in the Laundromat below this building (Sydney Laundry @ 234 Elizabeth St). Costs are definitely the cheapest in Sydney CBD: only $2/day for small bag, $5-6/day for large luggage. Another options: Across the road at Central Station called Smart Carte (5 minutes walk) or World Square Shopping Centre (4 minutes walk).
interaction: You'll be the only guests staying, so enjoy the space! We will be there to welcome you in and answer any questions you might have, then we will be just a quick text or phone call away! Guests will check themselves out and leave keys on the table. All we ask is that you be respectful to our neighbours. Please note I like to accommodate my guests arrivals and departures as best as possible, just let me know what time you would like to check in and check out and we will do our best to let you stay as long as possible, but at times we will need the apartment to be vacated by 10am and the check in to be after 3pm. The best way to contact us is via AirBnb. Otherwise you can also reach us via SMS or Mobile when necessary. Rest assured, my response time is pretty much instant. I or a trusted friend will be available leading up to and during your stay to answer any questions you may have.
house_rules: - - Welcome to our cozy and comfortable apartment - located in the most convenient location in Sydney CBD! We want you to feel like home, this is our policy and it worked for a very long time. Many of our guests are friends now and we do keep in touch and visit. If this property is booked, look at the other one which is linked to this one. Respectful, quiet (no parties) and clean & tidy people are welcomed in my home. NO rowdiness please consider other guests. The house is always spotless as I am a very proud home owner. I love to socialise but privacy is also respected and assured. Happy to give you directions & ideas about touring Sydney etc. Smoking is only allowed outside if required. Please leave the room as nice and tidy as you found it. *Key pick-up:* Please text me via Airbnb few days before the check-in date to arrange key pick-up. *Keys: A LOST KEY WILL BE CHARGED $250 - THIS IS NON NEGOTIABLE FOR WHAT A KEY FOB COSTS TO REPLACE IN THIS BUILDING. *Check-in time*: Check-in is
host_about:
Originally from Switzerland and part Viet, I am an avid traveller, always keen to discover very different and wonderful places around the globe. 
Taking in the varied cultures, sights and food !

My home is always a calming and relaxing base for me to come back to.

The experience of being an Airbnb host and meeting so many lovely people along the way is really something I particularly enjoy, my main aim is to create a comfortable, relaxing and "home away from home" experience for guests.

My priority is to always be readily available and provide as much info and assistance as possible, all the things I value when traveling somewhere new myself.

neighborhood_overview: Few suburbs encompass as much history as Millers point, the waterfront neighbourhood on the western side of the Harbour Bridge. It is a historic harbourside enclave with 19th-century terraced houses and laid-back pubs from the 1840s on its steep streets. Locals and office workers take in Harbour Bridge views from Observatory Hill Park and the waterfront Barangaroo Reserve, a popular picnic spot. The piers of Walsh Bay are home to bars, restaurants, outdoor sculpture and arts spaces that host dance and theatre performances. Closeby is also the Sydney Observatory which offers day and night tours of the Southern Sky up close.
notes: We manage many Airbnb properties in the best locations around Sydney city area. Very flexible with check in and checkout times. All the locations have storage areas so early drop off the luggage and storing luggage till late is not problem at all. (Free luggage storage to save the hassle of carrying around). We have a team who is available for 24 hours so no risk of staying without assistance if emergencies happen. If requested cleaning and towels, sheets change can be arranged for a small fee. We use services of high quality bed linen, sheets and towel supplier. So fresh and and extremely clean beddings and towels guaranteed. We can arrange self check in or in person check in. Trying to keep standards up high and provide ultimate hotel like experience in our apartments.

name: Take in the Original Charm of a Paddington Village Cottage
summary: Indulge in an afternoon bath in a skylit room and leave the French doors open to a private garden. This cottage has a sunny and breezy indoor-outdoor feel because of its abundant skylights, terra cotta tiles, casual furnishings, and white decor.
space: You will be situated in Paddington's original village! This area was built in 1850's during the construction of Victoria Barracks. With tiny streets and quaint cottages there is very minimal local traffic. The home itself is bathed in light. There is a beautiful big oak table that is wonderful to use for dinners or as a work table. The entire back section of the space opens out onto a secluded courtyard. A marble bathroom also opens fully onto the courtyard. With so much glass it feels like you're outside! On the ground floor there is also a lounge room with a comfortable feather filled sofa, TV and DVD player. There is a fully equipped kitchen and a laundry on the ground floor also. Upstairs there is a comfortable queen size bed with european linens. The space comfortably sleeps two people.   There are two windows in the bedroom with a lovely outlook over the rooftops of Paddington. Ceiling fans in every room assist the breeze that you will have being in Sydney's true eastern suburbs
description: Indulge in an afternoon bath in a skylit room and leave the French doors open to a private garden. This cottage has a sunny and breezy indoor-outdoor feel because of its abundant skylights, terra cotta tiles, casual furnishings, and white decor.
neighborhood_overview: The cottage is in the village of Paddington, where Victorian terrace houses line leafy, winding streets. There is a cafe or art gallery on every block, and an array of designer goods to be admired. Everything needed is a short walk away.
notes: Have I already said that you will love the house and location? - PLEASE NOTE: there is no additional cleaning fee for stays less than four weeks. For longer stays of four weeks or more there will be an additional cleaning fee of $140 AUD.
transit: There are buses that go into the city and then in the opposite direction to Bondi Beach within a 5 minute walk. Always plenty of taxis available from Oxford street. There is street parking if you need it (restricted times).
access: Guests should relax and feel at home in the space.  - Flat screen Tv - DVD Player - Washing Machine - Wi fi - Timber floors - Spanish tiled bathroom and courtyard As it is a small quiet neighbourhood I ask that my guests respect the space and the neighbourhood. We ask guests to be mindful of neighbours with minimal noise after 11pm and treat the house like their own home leaving it in a tidy state. To reduce our carbon footprint, we also ask that all lights, heaters, fans, and other electrical devices please be turned off when not being utilised and when checking out of the house. Kindly leave high heels at the front door so as not to damage our beautiful timber floor. Thank you.
interaction: There is a lock box so you can self check in or I will  meet the guests upon arrival. I will be happy to assist my guests with anything they need. I will be just a phone call away!
house_rules: #NAME?
host_about:
I love travelling and meeting new people and experiencing new places.  I have lived in Los Angeles for many years  and had a career in beautiful five star hotels. Now that I am back in Sydney I am involved in the arts. My husband travels a lot for work and when we are in Sydney we live elsewhere and keep this Paddington Cottage for when we have an event on in the city.  

My favourite travel destinations are:
- Italy: favourite cities -  Roma, Bolzano, Sorrento, Palermo, Firenze.

And of course I still call Los Angeles, California home! New Zealand is a favourite destination too.

I can't live without my morning coffee, swims in the ocean, the Italian Film Festival, great breakfasts at Bills Sydney, reformer pilates and spending time with family and friends.

As a guest I am easy going, respectful, have a low foot print and appreciate the wonderful people you can meet through Airbnb when travelling.
