name: Special price! Beautiful, close to city, 1br apt
summary: Beautifully furnished 1 bedroom apartment in historic Surry Hills. Surrounded by great cafes and restaurants, close but not too close to the CBD.
space: A very, light and airy, comfortable apartment in the heart of Surry Hills. There is a balcony looking out over the trees, complete with an urban garden (you may even be able to pick tomatoes for your breakfast, if your timing is good!).  The bedroom  has a comfortable queen sized bed, a wardrobe and chest of drawers.
description: Beautifully furnished 1 bedroom apartment in historic Surry Hills. Surrounded by great cafes and restaurants, close but not too close to the CBD. A very, light and airy, comfortable apartment in the heart of Surry Hills. There is a balcony looking out over the trees, complete with an urban garden (you may even be able to pick tomatoes for your breakfast, if your timing is good!).  The bedroom  has a comfortable queen sized bed, a wardrobe and chest of drawers. You are welcome to make use of the kitchen if you wish to cook, including those basics that are a pain to get when travelling, like condiments, spices and sauces. Coffee and tea are available. You're welcome to make use of the living spaces, complete with a very comfortable couch, a fabulously large tv and a dining space with dining table. This is a great place to gather and chat, with books and some games available. Sadly, I won't meet you as I let the apartment while I'm out of town however I would be delighted to help you get
neighborhood_overview: Surry Hills is a fabulous neighbourhood, with a plethora of fantastic restaurants, cafes and local pubs to cater for all tastes. An eclectic and diverse neighbourhood, it's close to Central Station and Crown Street.
notes: Children are welcome, however please keep in mind that it isn't childproof, there are sharp edges and the cupboards don't have child-proof features on them, and it is my home. The windows do have things on them to stop them opening very far so children don't bounce themselves off the bed out of the window but that's as far as it goes.  I apologise, but the house isn't suitable for pets. Please do note that this is an urban neighbourhood and there can sometimes be a lot of activity.
transit: We're about a 5-10 min walk from Central Station, Hyde Park and Crown Street. If you love exploring on foot, it takes about 30 mins to walk into Darling Harbour, or approx. 45 mins to get to Circular Quay and Ubers are easy to locate when your feet have had enough!
access: You are welcome to make use of the kitchen if you wish to cook, including those basics that are a pain to get when travelling, like condiments, spices and sauces. Coffee and tea are available. You're welcome to make use of the living spaces, complete with a very comfortable couch, a fabulously large tv and a dining space with dining table. This is a great place to gather and chat, with books and some games available.
interaction: Sadly, I won't meet you as I let the apartment while I'm out of town however I would be delighted to help you get to know our city, and make recommendations for places to go, restaurants and things to do. The neighbourhood is fantastic and there is plenty of all sorts within walking distance.
house_rules: - Please be considerate of others in and around the apartment. This is a quiet neighbourhood, and out of respect for our neighbours, we ask you to be reasonably quiet when outside, especially after 9pm. - Last but not least, I'm keen to make sure you have the best possible trip so please drop me a message prior to requesting to book, letting me know a little about you and your trip. That way I can tailor my recommendations to you and let you know if there's anything I know about that you might want to consider. - No smoking and no pets on the property please. Please look after our apartment, we love it dearly and hope you enjoy staying here as much as we do. - Number of guests must match the number in your booking.
host_about:
I moved from Auckland to Sydney in 2017 and I'm currently working in IT. I love to meet new people, and have acquired a bit of a travel bug a few years ago. I try to keep in shape, but unfortunately I'm a little too fond of good food and wine to make it into magazines.

I'm clean and tidy, and am considerate of the others around me and their property. I can't live without wifi/data. (And yes I can remember the days they didn't exist for us mere mortals!)

name: Mosman - Harbourside House w/ Pool
summary: Our large home looks directly onto the sparkling waters of Middle Harbour in Mosman in Sydney. We are footsteps from harbourside bush paths as well as close to Balmoral and Chinaman's Beach and all that Mosman has to offer. Minimum stay 5 nights
space: Positioned just one street back from Middle Harbour in the exclusive harbourside suburb of Mosman about 9 kilometres from the centre of Sydney. Beauty Point is a quiet enclave in Mosman but also very close to all the Northern Beaches starting from Manly about 10 minutes away. Our light filled home has 4 bedrooms upstairs, including a master with ensuite bathroom and walk in robe, a small balcony and one other full bathroom. 3 of the 4 bedrooms have exquisite harbour views and all have built in wardrobes. The bedrooms are configured as follows: Master - 1 king sized bed .  Bedroom 2  - 1 queen sized bed Bedroom 3 - Single bed with trundle Bedroom 4 - Single bed The main entry level includes a separate lounge, a combined kitchen /dining/family room and a small media room with TV/DVD as well as guest powder room and a large fully equipped laundry with washing machine and dryer. The lounge and kitchen/dining open with full length glass doors to a travertine balcony with outdoor sofa and di
description: Our large home looks directly onto the sparkling waters of Middle Harbour in Mosman in Sydney. We are footsteps from harbourside bush paths as well as close to Balmoral and Chinaman's Beach and all that Mosman has to offer. Minimum stay 5 nights Positioned just one street back from Middle Harbour in the exclusive harbourside suburb of Mosman about 9 kilometres from the centre of Sydney. Beauty Point is a quiet enclave in Mosman but also very close to all the Northern Beaches starting from Manly about 10 minutes away. Our light filled home has 4 bedrooms upstairs, including a master with ensuite bathroom and walk in robe, a small balcony and one other full bathroom. 3 of the 4 bedrooms have exquisite harbour views and all have built in wardrobes. The bedrooms are configured as follows: Master - 1 king sized bed .  Bedroom 2  - 1 queen sized bed Bedroom 3 - Single bed with trundle Bedroom 4 - Single bed The main entry level includes a separate lounge, a combined kitchen /dining/family ro
neighborhood_overview: We are 5 minutes walk from a large harbourside reserve at the Spit where there is a marina and yacht club. The Spit reserve has several excellent restaurants from pizza to fine dining and importantly takeaway coffee! Its a short drive to the harbourside beaches of Balmoral and Chinaman's Beach and the village hub of Mosman with its many boutiques and relaxed cafe culture. It is a quiet neighbourhood characterised by large exclusive family homes. It is very peaceful yet very close to transport.
transit: We are well serviced by direct buses into the City (100 metres away) and Manly (7-8 minutes walk away) and the Northern Beaches as well as a local free minibus service that goes from right outside the front gate to Balmoral beach and all the shopping at Mosman.  There is ferry service to the City form the other side of Mosman.
access: All parts of the house but not the garage.
interaction: We will be available by mobile phone throughout the stay and can arrange a local contact in case of emergencies. The swimming pool will be serviced weekly during your stay.
house_rules: Please treat our home as your own and no smoking indoors or parties. Small dogs or cats are allowed if house trained but please discuss with me first.

neighborhood_overview: Birchgrove is a beautiful part of the Balmain Peninsular. It is in the inner city and has great  cafes, good bus and ferry links to the City and is close to universities and hospitals.   Its population is largely professional and academic.
notes: No smoking indoors. No pets as we already have a dog and cat. A complimentary bottle of wine from our own label will be provide to all guests who book for 5 days or more
transit: The nearest bus stop is 100metres and there are 2 different  ferries to Circular Quay . One is 10 minutes walk the other 15 minutes walk. Walking to shops and cafes is recommended.The Balmain ferry from Thames st takes 10 minutes to Circular Quay- a beautiful trip under the Harbour bridge and past the Opera House Cars can be parked in the street and it is unmetered.

interaction: We enjoy visitors. They may be invited to eat with us if they are sick of the scores of restaurants, cafes and pubs all within 15 minutes walk of the loft. However we respect guest's privacy.

host_about:
I am a teacher in Adult Basic Education. I live with my husband and family  in Birchgrove. I am a keen cook, gardener and generally an active person. I love movies, reading, going to art galleries and sitting around talking to friends. When we can afford it my husband and I love to travel in Europe.
As a host I want guests to have a good experience in our neighbourhood, enjoying the tranquility and privacy so near to the city. Your are completely private in your accommodation. We will not disturb your privacy but we are very willing to answer queries and generally be helpful. Breakfast foods  are supplied and it is possible for guests to cook.

host_about: Carol and myself have lived in this house since 1980 and have been accommodating friends and guests in the studio since 2001, which is a conversion of the original stables to the house. Carol is a retired teacher and I am now also retired from 40 years in IT. Both of us enjoy travel, exploring, art, books and live theatre. As well, I am a cyclist (yes ride on Sydney roads) and also a keen bushwalker. Carol enjoys books and we have a very open house. Over the years we have had many people live with us from many countries in our many rooms.

name: Perfect apartment in the heart of Newtown
summary: Our wonderful light and airy apartment is in the heart of Newtown, one of the most vibrant and hip Sydney neighbourhoods. We love its dark timber floors, the clawfoot bathtub, the cozy kitchen and a perfect little porch just off it. It's got all the amenities for a perfect stay. Newtown station is a minute walk away and it'll take you 6 minutes on the train to get to Central. There's plenty of free and safe parking around.
space: The place has two lovely bedrooms with double beds and a spacious living/dining room.

Newtown station is a minute walk away and it'll take you 6 minutes on the train to get to Central. There's plenty of free and safe parking around. The place has two lovely bedrooms with double beds and a spacious living/dining room. The entire place. As much or as little as necessary. Newtown is all the rage. name: Boutique Urban Contemporary Studio
summary: Experience a quiet escape in this ground level lifestyle apartment. The space features Scandinavian style decor and furnishings, neutral tones, and access to the shared kitchen and outdoor patio with a dining space and sun loungers.
space: I manage 2 apartments in this block, the apartment right next door so if you require 2 apartments or this one is booked and you would like to see if the other apartment is available please message me. This spacious and very comfortable studio apartment has modern furniture and all the amenities you need including a Nespresso. The apartment is fresh, clean and visually nice to spend time in, and bonus internal modern kitchenette (for basic food preparation) and bathroom. The shared areas are well designed and generous in proportion with outdoor dining, deck chairs and barbeque for that great aussie cook up! This apartment is location central! Right in the hub of Bondi Junction, with shopping, buses, trains and plenty of lifestyle options at your doorstep. And with a hop skip and jump (best done as a walk, bike ride or bus) you will find yourself landing in the world famous bondi beach.. you may even spot the bondi rescue crew!
description: Experience a quiet escape in this ground level lifestyle apartment. The space features Scandinavian style decor and furnishings, neutral tones, and access to the shared kitchen and outdoor patio with a dining space and sun loungers.
neighborhood_overview: The location sits a 5 minute walk from buses and trains in Bondi Junction, as well as plenty of pubs, bars, cafes, and restaurants. Close by is Bondi Beach with local shops, weekend markets, and the Bondi to Bronte coastal walk.
notes: Please treat the apartment, our neighbours and the area with respect. We share this place with other guests so thank you for treating our home like you would your own. Strictly no parties, remember to keep things relaxed when at the home, no excessive noise and if you want to party there are bars and clubs to enjoy all within walking distance. And please let me know if there is anything that needs attention or where we can improve :))
transit: Convenient transport options at your doorstep. Five minute walking distance to the bus interchange and trains of Bondi Junction (BJ). One minute walk to the bus  which takes you straight down Bondi Road to the beach (or a 25 minute walk). The trains and buses at Bondi Junction connect to the CBD or other parts of Sydney including amazing harbour bays such as Watsons Bay and Camp Cove. Sydney has a hop-on hop-off tourist bus service so you can experience Sydney and the famous harbour as well as Bondi beach with 33 stops on the Big Bus Sydney and Bondi Explorer. A GoGet, car share service is across the road. Other transport options are Uber or taxi. Basically there is no need for your own car. If biking is more your style, try bike sharing, download the app for either Reddy Go (red bike) and oBike (yellow bike) and check the app for a bike near you. Bondi Junction Westfields is less than a 5 minute walk and it’s a shoppers paradise.. plenty of shops and a number of leading brands.. serio
access: The main access to the apartment is on the side of the building and the apartment itself is located on the ground floor. The studio space is your private space with kitchenette and bathroom. The building has shared areas you can enjoy.. full kitchen, lounge area and outdoor area with barbeque.
interaction: I’m Anna, a Bondi local and I'm your host. I am a professional and dedicated local host who loves living in the area so I’m close by and contactable. As your host it’s my job to make sure you enjoy the apartment and the area. My level of interaction is totally up to you, I’m always close by. I can also provide concierge services so please reach out and ask. In the apartment you will find a welcome manual with more information on the apartment, tips on the area and my local recommendations.
house_rules: Quiet hours are between 10pm-8am The kitchenette in this apartment is for basic food preparation, please avoid excessive cooking in the apartment. Please use the shared area for cooking and leave neat, clean and tidy. Please clean up what you have used.
host_about:
I’m Anna and I run a property management business, anna at bondi. As professional and dedicated host I'm all about the guest experience and can also provide concierge services on request. 
I am a social person and enjoy spending quality time with friends and family. I exercise regularly to maintain a fit and healthy lifestyle and I believe in a positive attitude to life and having fun. I have two rag doll cats and they are cute to live with as they race up and down the stairs and in and out of the home. I also walk/exercise my neighbours dog as often as I can which I love.
Thanks..

summary: Manly absolute beachfront, opposite beautiful cove. Short level stroll to ferry
space: Modern apartment, directly on a stunning beach cove.  This is one of the secret beach coves the locals go to, away from the tourists, but an 8 minute level stroll to the city ferry, gorgeous restaurants and supermarket The apartment is newly renovated, with beautifully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom for each bedroom. We love stepping out front and finding ourselves on the famous hike between manly and Mosman, with native forest and gorgeous views over the harbor. We love the sunsets over the Sydney harbor, and the warm sheltered parkland right in front of the apartment for picnics and celebration. we love strolling to a selection of restaurants, and the great bakeries and coffee shops, or going to the city without having to worry about parking.

The property is over 2 floors so you can spread out and find your own space after a big day out in Sydney. Parking is included and is located approximately 150 meters away in a different address which is extremely handy as parking is very difficult in this area.
description: Enjoy a relaxing morning on the furnished balcony attached to this cosy and welcoming city house. Inside, the layout makes the best use of the space with plush fittings, welcoming day beds, and plenty of storage space.
neighborhood_overview: The home lies in the heart of Sydney’s Surry Hills. Stroll along the vibrant and colourful Riley St. Oxford St (Darlinghurst), World Square, and the CBD for great dining and drinking options.
notes: Parking is included for one (1) Vehicle and if you need additional parking street parking is restricted to 1 hour metered between 8am - 10pm. There are a few parking garages in the area with current prices online with any search engine. The included car park is an offsite car park approximately 150meters, instructions are located in the link provided. This link will open 2 days before travel.  No luggage can stored before or after your stay due to an agreement in place with the external cleaning company due to liability. Luggage storage is located at central station and is called Smart Carte, pricing can be found online.  The cleaner will contact you directly once the the property is ready for your arrival. If you do not hear from the cleaner check in is 2pm.  We often have to deal with  a lot of variables so please do not enter the property before receiving a message or before 2pm. Please do not ask for an early check in, we will get you in as soon as possible on arrival day.  The pro
transit: The CBD and key tourist attractions are within walking distance. Buses and trains are very close by. For easy-to-understand public transport information, search online for "Trip Planner NSW". The Trip Planner website is excellent and so easy to use. Simply punch in where are (Riley St Surry Hills) and where you want to go and it will show you how to get there by bus, train, and/or ferry. Taxis and Uber are also immediately available.
access: Guest have access to the entire house. There is plenty of storage, and you have full use of all the closets and drawers. So you can unpack and settle into the property as if it were your home.
interaction: I reside in  nearby and I am easily reached by phone if you require assistance regarding the property. I am here to help.

summary: Light filled 24 sqm motel style studio  Super comfy queen bed with luxe bedding.  WIFI and TV (Netflix and streaming ready, sign in and chill),  Ensuite bathroom.  Mini fridge and kettle with tea/coffee/milk provided.
space: The studio is located on the top floor of a three-storey walk-up 1920s building; with the entire top floor to yourself.  We live in the apartment on the middle floor and we may bump into you on the stairwell, happy to answers any questions and just as happy to leave you to it! The ensuite bathroom is uniquely located on the top of the stairs, partitioned with a curtain to the stairs and a door to the bedroom (please see photos).  Please note, there are no kitchen facilities in the studio, however, there is an abundance of eateries and watering holes at your doorstep. Who wants to cook on holidays anyway :)

neighborhood_overview: Redfern combines slices of Sydney history and is the heartbeat of the city’s modern creative arts scene. If you’re looking for quality dining, small bar hopping and some of inner Sydney’s best cultural pursuits all in one place, then look no further. Take an evening wander along Redfern Street to experience top bars, pubs, restaurants, and live music and performance venues alongside rustic brunch spots, galleries and tucked-away community gardens. BARS are aplenty in close vicinity, our favourites include Arcadia, The Noble Hops, GDR,  Cake Wines Cellar Door, Bart Jnr,  Mjolner, Misfits, Moya’s Juniper,  The Dock, The Bearded Tit and Carriageworks  CAFES & RESTAURANTS for when the hunger pains set include:  Henry Lees, Three Williams, Fern St Eatery, Donut Papi, Scout’s Honour  Milk bar (by cafeish), Scout’s honour,  Hunter’s Corner, Happy D’s, Eathouse diner, Tudor Hotel, Isaac restaurant,  Redfern Continental, House of crabs,   Breadfern Bakery, Ron’s upstairs  There is a supermarket
notes: Please note: - - No kitchen facilities  - Three storey walk up building
transit: Transport - we are 400m from Redfern train station, 10-minute walk to Central station. Get the perfect insta selfie in front of the Sydney Harbour bridge after a quick 10-minute train ride or a leisurely 45-minute walk into town. Bondi Beach is 8km away and easily access via public transport.
host_about: I'm a 30 year old professional who resides in Sydney Australia who loves to travel and experience new cities and cultures.

name: Summer Paradise-Light, Breezy & Spacious Apartment
summary: Beautiful, spacious and very clean apartment, on the top floor, located between Maroubra junction and Maroubra beach, close to shops and transport. Perfect for bright and sunny Sydney weather! The apartment is fully furnished and equipped, with a large backyard and a relaxing atmosphere.  Walk to the beach. Walk to the shops. Bus Stop near by (30 min journey to the city) Ample parking on the street. Cafes, shops and restaurants are all walking distance.
space: Our apartment has a cool, sea breeze blowing through it. There are 2 lovely bedrooms, 1 with a queen bed and 1 with a large king size bed (which can also be rolled into a king single) both with fitted wardrobes. There is also a sun room with a study area and a newly renovated bathroom.  Our modest kitchen is easy to navigate and fully stocked. There is access to a shared laundry with plenty of outside drying space.  The unit is our home and we live in it day to day, although often house sit while the in-laws are on holidays or go on holidays ourselves!

Maroubra junction is only a few mins walk away and has grocery shops plus additional cafes.  Bus stop is right outside the house for buses into the city. Everything you need for the perfect, relaxing getaway!
transit: On street parking is easy.  Bus stop out the front.  Walking to beach or shops!
access: Wifi, TV, DVD, towels, BBQ, everything you need while you are away from your own home.
interaction: When we house sit, we stay about 3 min down the road so can be available at fairly short notice should you need anything during your stay. When are are away on holidays, you will meet Mum We also offer our home when we are away on holidays and if you are our guest during this time our parents will be available instead.
house_rules: - Quiet block of only two apartments. Our friendly neighbours live in the lower floor apartment and mindfulness of them living below is appreciated (no stomping/jumping). - strictly no loud noise or any form of parties allowed. Your casual bbq is just fine
